title: It is happening... Urgot Teaser

embed.description: Urgot is now a juggernaut, be careful or he might grind you up. Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): http://amzn.to/2leXAxO Reveal Page: http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/champion-urgot-the-dreadnought

body:
http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/featured/champion-urgot-the-dreadnought

So, we have a teaser for our favorite ~~meme~~ champion.
That do you guys think?

replies.body:
Here's the Reveal Website

http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/featured/champion-urgot-the-dreadnought
So now that Urgot is revealed are we going to hear the next two reworks after Eve sometime in the next couple weeks?
I should have a new Champion Roadmap Blog out later this month
I am so ready for Urgot's VO
Its amazing

Hopefully it sounds like the Scrake from Killing Floor . nothing but gutteral, raspy gurgly yells of anger and psychoctic  rage.

https://youtu.be/EhaMmYFANQQ

on a side note since both Urgot ult and Fizz shark remove bodies off the map on kills maybe its time to give {{champion:223}}   devour the same treatment?

on a SIDE SIDE note does Urgot have melee attacks the same way Thresh and Rakan do? I always thought it would fit his character.
Do you know if the VO is coming today?
And you know whats more amazing ? The keyword "dreadnought". After Darius, isnt it the Time to release a new Warhammer 40k Skin ?? ;)) *wink wink*
Hey Reav3 I know its a bit early but can i ask who's project would takes over the urgot pod SolCrushed or 20thCenturyFaux's? since you mention they were doing exploration
20th
If he end up being lauched too weak, can his shotguns reset ammo on kills? XD

Riot Scruffy mentioned that with the diver update being cancelled the divers who needed help the most like Xin Zhao and DIana would still be prioritized and that Xin already had some work under way. By prioritize are we talking next 6 months or should I just not get my hopes up any time soon?
Sweet, looking forward to it.

> [{quoted}](name=Raxistaicho,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YU1Ypf9u,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-07T19:05:49.438+0000)
>
> So now that Urgot is revealed are we going to hear the next two reworks after Eve sometime in the next couple weeks?

only the next one , the other one will be revealed after Eve rework
Awww

That symbol he is getting on his arm is the same symbol on the man clothes who is in the tube. I think I saw it somewhere already. Is it simplified Noxus symbol or??.
Also he wants to kill leaders of Zaun, is that a typo and it's actually meant to be Noxus or?.

It's not a typo, he resides in Zaun. The symbol he is getting burned into his arm is the symbol of the Chem Baron in the tube behind him. He burns the symbol of all the Chem Barons he kills onto himself.
That's fucking metal. Thanks for these lore insights!

I'd lie if I said that I didn't scream and then cry a little out of happiness when I saw this.
Urgot was my first ever champ and my second ever main, so he's had a special place in my heart since September 2011.

It seems like he feels terrifyingly awesome to play (And he's still weird! But in a good way!).
And omg, his skins- All four (including the classic and their splashes) look phenomenal.

Reav3, could you please send my regards and love to the Urgot team? <3

Hey thanks the team really put all their passion into the project!
And they did amazingly! This is pretty much the only thing I've been waiting for since they announced that Urgot was the next VGU... and you guys blew my expectations out of the water.

It really shows, too!
Thanks for all the awesome work, Larry! Can't wait to see what you guys will be working on next!

######I have a hunch that _you_ are very _personally_ excited about your next one and for a reason, if I'm guessing correctly. ;^)
can Urgot's knee guns crit?

No, it seems like a ranged version of T.Hydra.

The main attack can crit, but the shotgun damage is separate.
i say let them crit
I say let it grow.

reave3 i love the urgot rework!!! btw, who is the next champ to decrease its price alongside kha'zix?? is it akali?? please let it be akali because i need to buy her :'( and i wish nunu would be the next VGU after eve because he needs an update and also freljord. and its perfect for an event for winter if you would release a nunu rework in 6 months lol

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YU1Ypf9u,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-07-07T19:01:24.700+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=Tialilia,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YU1Ypf9u,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-07T18:49:50.424+0000)
> So, we have a teaser for our favorite ~~meme~~ champion.
> That do you guys think?

I'm fairly sure it will be a dark, secret past.

I'm honestly in love with everything I've seen so far. His kit looks way less awkward while still keeping some iconic elements like the corrosive charge lock-on, a shield on W (even if it's tied to a brand new ability), and his sick new ult being a sort of spiritual successor to his old one but a million times more fitting. His new skins are all drop dead gorgeous. I mean, crabgot went from a laughing stock to a terrifying kaiju for god's sake. 

The only thing really left to discover other than actually playing him is his new voice. Unlike most older champions I thought Urgot's voice actually sounded decent despite having tragically few lines. The pained, gargle-y sound of them really suited him and definitely wouldn't be out of place on new Urgot either, so I really have my fingers crossed for something similar. All in all I've been looking forward to this since long before Urgot's rework was even announced and I couldn't be happier with the outcome!
i kinda dont like how his human arm seems like that of a newborn baby's,i would have preferred it to be a but more scarred and bloody but i guess thats just me
Dude looks so much like Makron from Quake 4
So {{champion:6}} R is pretty much an Apocalypse's secondary ability on Red Alert 3...

Yeah, this is cool and all that, but where is the Giant Enemy Crabgot skin?

EDIT: OH MY GOD NEVERMIND IT'S AT THE END. AMAAAAAAAAZING.

HYPE!!!! SO MUCH HYPE

The Urgod returns and sadly I have a feeling I might suck with him, but who gives a crap! Ima play him anyway!

EDIT: Looking at his reveal page, his character reminds me a lot of Bane from Batman... and I love it. Well done Riot. Very well done.
Looks amazing looking forward to this one hell of a champion.
